data.name: Hood: Outlaws & Legends - Season 3: Ostara - Battle Pass
data.detailed_description:
This product is included in Hood: Outlaws & Legends – Year 1 Edition.

Season 3: Ostara – Battle Pass is the third part of the full 3-Season Battle Pass and contains a wide range of unique unlockable cosmetics for every Outlaw.

Season 3: Ostara – Battle Pass includes 103 items:
• 3 instant rewards
• 30 Outfits
• 50 Weapon Skins
• 20 Banner Packs

Progress through tiers to unlock the cosmetics by playing games and earning experience points. Cosmetics are exclusive to this Battle Pass and can only be unlocked during this Season.

Some Battle Pass items are free, meaning any player can progress through the Battle Pass. You’ll need to buy the Battle Pass to unlock the paid items.

data.short_description: This product is included in Hood: Outlaws & Legends – Year 1 Edition. Season 3: Ostara – Battle Pass is the third part of the full 3-Season Battle Pass and contains a wide range of time-limited and unique unlockable cosmetics.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD FX 6300 X6 / Intel Core i5-3570K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, Radeon HD 7870 / GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 40 FPS, 1920x1080 in low.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 / Intel Core i5-8600K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM, Radeon RX 590 / GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 60 FPS, 1920x1080 in ultra.
